name: User creates new account
description:
As a User of the FitBoi application
I would like to create a new user profile
So that I can use the application as intended to log my personal goals and track my fitness progress.

elements.name: User successfully logs in (Normal flow)

steps.name: the User is not currently logged into the FitBoi application
the entered e-mail is valid
the password is valid
the combination of email and password is valid
a login request is made
a User is logged in to their account

elements.name: User enters invalid data (Error flow)

steps.name: the User is not currently logged into the FitBoi application
the data entered into any field is invalid
a login request is made
a User is not logged into their account

elements.name: User enters a correct e-mail but an incorrect password (Error flow)

steps.name: the User is not currently logged into the FitBoi application
the entered e-mail is valid
the password entered is invalid
a login request is made
a User is not logged into their account

elements.name: User enters credentials for an account that does not exist (Error flow)

steps.name: the User is not currently logged into the FitBoi application
valid data is entered in the email and password fields
the User does not exist on the platform
a login request is made
the User is not logged in

elements.name: The connection to the database cannot be established from a user connection point (Error flow)

steps.name: the User is not currently logged into the FitBoi application
valid data is entered in the email and password fields
there is no valid internet connection on the device
a login request is made
the User is not logged in

elements.name: The connection to the database cannot be established from a server problem (Error flow)

steps.name: the User is not currently logged into the FitBoi application
valid data is entered in the email and password fields
there is no valid connection from the server
a login request is made
the User is not logged in

name: User logs in
description:
As a User of the FitBoi application
I would like to log in with my credentials
So that I can view my personal data and log values relevant to myself

elements.name: User successfully logs food item using search (Normal flow)

steps.name: the User is logged in
the database contains the desired food item
the User selects the desired food item from the search results
a request to log the food item is made
the User's calorie count is updated using the desired food item

elements.name: User fails to logs item (Error flow)

steps.name: the User is logged in
the database does not contain the desired food item
a request to log the food item is made
the User will be unable to log the food item

name: Log a food item
description:
As a User
I would like to be able to log my consumed food items
So that my personal analytics will update with accurate data and provide me with information about reaching my goals

elements.name: User goal is edited (Normal flow)

steps.name: the User goal is created
the goal is selected
changes made to the goal targets are valid
clicking the update goal button
the goal is updated and persisted to the database
the "Successful goal update" message is issued

elements.name: User cannot perform updates (Alternate flow)

steps.name: a User in on the goal page
no goals are available
no information is accessible

elements.name: User enters invalid goal targets (Error flow)

steps.name: the User goal is created
the goal is selected
changes made to the goal targets are invalid
clicking the update goal button
the goal is not updated
the "Invalid updates" message is issued

elements.name: User does not save updates (Error flow)

steps.name: the User goal is created
the goal is selected
changes are made to the goal targets
clicking the exit button
the goal is not updated
the "Updates cancelled" message is issued

name: User edits a current goal
description:
As a User of the FitBoi application
I would like to edit an outstanding goal associated to my profile
So that I can better adapt my goals to my current progress

elements.name: User goal is ended (Normal flow)

steps.name: the User goal is created
the goal is selected
clicking the end button
the goal is archived and persisted to the database
the "Finished goal" message is issued

elements.name: User cannot perform updates (Alternate flow)

steps.name: a User in on the goal page
no goals are available
no information is accessible

elements.name: User losses connection to goal (Error flow)

steps.name: the User goal is created
the goal is selected
connection is between User and server is dropped
clicking the end button
the goal is not updated
the "Cannot update goal" message is issue

name: User ends a current goal
description:
As a User of the FitBoi application
I would like to end an outstanding goal associated to my profile
So that I can start a new goal to better track my future fitness trajectory

elements.name: User successfully adds a preset goal with no current goal in progress (Normal flow)

steps.name: the User is on the goals dashboard
there is no goal currently in progress
the User has selected one of three preset goals
clicking the set goal button
the User adds a goal to their profile
the "Successfully added new goal" message is issued

elements.name: User successfully adds a preset goal with a current goal in progress (Normal flow)

steps.name: the User is on the goals dashboard
there is a goal currently in progress
the User has selected one of three preset goals
clicking the set goal button
the User is given a prompt informing that they will override their current goal
the User clicks the confirm button
the User adds a goal to their profile
the "Successfully added new goal" message is issued

elements.name: User successfully adds a custom goal with no current goal in progress (Alternate flow)

steps.name: the User is on the goals dashboard
there is no goal currently in progress
the User has entered a custom goal
clicking the set goal button
the User adds a goal to their profile
the "Successfully added new custom goal" message is issued

elements.name: User successfully adds a custom goal with a current goal in progress (Alternate flow)

steps.name: the User is on the goals dashboard
there is a goal currently in progress
the User has entered a custom goal
clicking the set goal button
the User is given a prompt informing that they will override their current goal
the User clicks the confirm button
the User adds a goal to their profile
the "Successfully added new custom goal" message is issued

elements.name: User enters invalid data (Error flow)

steps.name: the User is on the goals dashboard
the User has entered a custom goal
the data is invalid
clicking the set goal button
a User adds a goal to their profile
the User is given a prompt informing that they will override their current goal
the "Input invalid" message is issued

name: User sets a new goal
description:
As a user of the FitBoi application
I would like to specify my preferred fitness goal
So that FitBoi can tailor information to me and provide accurate analytics

elements.name: User views current consumption (Normal flow)

steps.name: the User is on the main dashboard
viewing the screen
the daily caloric consumtion values are displayed

elements.name: User cannot perform updates (Alternate flow)

steps.name: the User is on the main dashboard
viewing the screen
the daily caloric consumtion values are not displayed

elements.name: User cannot fetch information from server  (Error flow)

steps.name: the User is on the main dashboard
the connection between User and server is lost
no information is displayed

name: User sees daily consumption against goal
description:
As a User of the FitBoi application
I would like to see my current caloric for the current date versus my current goal
So that I can gauge what I should consume for the remainder of the day

elements.name: User sees the analytics dashboard with data (Normal Scenario)

steps.name: the User is on the analytics dashboard
there is data to display
the User selects an analytic type from a dropdown menu
the User selects their viewing scale for the graph
viewing the analytics dashboard
the graph will display the corresponding analytics type with the appropriate scale

elements.name: User sees the analytics dashboard void of data (Alternate Scenario)

steps.name: the User is on the analytics dashboard
there is no data to display
viewing the analytics dashboard
the graph will be empty

name: User sees analytics
description:
As a user
I would like to see my data tracked over time
So that I may visualize improvement or failures according to the goals I set 
and make decisions for myself based on data

elements.name: User views current consumption (Normal flow)

steps.name: the User is on the main dashboard
the add custom item button is pressed
the food item descriptions are added for all fields
the descriptions are valid
the item is submitted
the item placed in a database to be approved
the message "Item submitted" is displayed

elements.name: User submits an incomplete food item  (Error flow)

steps.name: the User is on the main dashboard
the add custom item button is pressed
the food item descriptions are added for not all fields
the item is submitted
an error message "Incomplete form" is displayed
the item is not sent to the database

elements.name: User submits an incomplete food item  (Error flow)

steps.name: the User is on the main dashboard
the add custom item button is pressed
the food item descriptions are added for all fields
a description is invalid
the item is submitted
an error message "Invalid form data" is displayed
the item is not sent to the database

name: User adds custom food item to database
description:
As a User of the FitBoi application
I would like to be able to add new foods to the database, 
So I can personalize my items if what I am looking for does not appear in the search.

elements.name: User successfully changes one profile value (Normal flow)

steps.name: the User is logged into FitBoi
they have clicked on the profile settings menu
the User has modified one value in their profile
clicking the save changes button
the profile changes are saved
the "Successfully modified one value" message is issued

elements.name: User successfully changes many or all values (Alternate flow)

steps.name: the User is logged into FitBoi
they have clicked on the profile settings menu
the User has modified multiple values at once in their profile
clicking the save changes button
the profile changes are saved
the "Successfully modified multiple value" message is issued

elements.name: User enters invalid data (Error flow)

steps.name: the User is logged into FitBoi
they have clicked on the profile settings menu
the User has modified multiple values in their profile with invalid data
clicking the save changes button
the profile changes are not saved
the "Input invalid" message is issued

elements.name: User exits the window without saving (Error flow)

steps.name: the User is logged into FitBoi
they have clicked on the profile settings menu
the User has modified multiple values in their profile
the User exits the current window
the profile changes are not saved
the "Data was not saved" message is issued

elements.name: Connectivity issue prevents data from persisting (Error flow)

steps.name: the User is logged into FitBoi
they have clicked on the profile settings menu
the User has modified multiple values in their profile
there is a lack of connection between the server and client
clicking the save changes button
the profile changes are not saved
the "Connectivity issues prevented saving" message is issued

name: User changes personal profile details
description:
As a user of the FitBoi application
I would like to modify my personal profile details
So that FitBoi can tailor information to me and provide accurate analytics and to rectify any mistakes made

elements.name: Today is or is not Friday

steps.name: today is "Friday"
I ask whether it's Friday yet
I should be told "TGIF"

elements.name: Today is or is not Friday

steps.name: today is "Sunday"
I ask whether it's Friday yet
I should be told "Nope"

elements.name: Today is or is not Friday

steps.name: today is "anything else!"
I ask whether it's Friday yet
I should be told "Nope"

name: Is it Friday yet?
description: Everybody wants to know when it's Friday
